Description:
Detects SSTI attempts sent via GET requests in access logs

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Server Side Template Injection Strings
Query: eql select * from _source_ where (cs-method = 'get' and (log like '%={{%' or log like '%=%7b%7b%' or log like '%=${%' or log like '%=$%7b%' or log like '%=<%=%' or log like '%=%3c%25=%' or log like '%=@(%' or log like '%freemarker.template.utility.execute%' or log like '%.getclass().forname('javax.script.scriptenginemanager')%' or log like '%t(org.apache.commons.io.ioutils)%') and  not sc-status = '404')
